Key Match Events: India won by 7 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Aaron Jones is currently this T20 World Cup's second-highest scorer, with 130 runs from two innings at a strike rate of nearly 197
Andries Gous is in fourth place, with 100 from two innings at a strike rate of almost 139
Jasprit Bumrah has an average of four and an economy rate of 2.85 after picking up five wickets for 20 runs in seven overs this tournament
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams have won two games each, and USA having every chance of making the last eight is every bit the stuff of dreams
India tend not to fuss with their plans unless they absolutely have to
Corey Anderson was the next big thing in all of cricket, hitting a 36-ball century in 2014
India are well placed to make the Super Eights. USA have some work to do, but they won't mind that
The New York surface has settled enough that the scary up-and-down bounce that was seen earlier in the competition seems to be a thing of the past
This will be the first cricket match between India and USA across any format
Miscellaneous Highlights: The LA Olympics organising committee, when announcing that they would let cricket in for the 2028 Games, name-checked Virat Kohli and his social media following as part of the reason for their decision

The USA is a fertile enough outpost thanks to its rich and varied diaspora, many of whom have been flocking to the pop-up stadium in Long Island, and creating the kind of atmosphere that could rival even the better established centres
